rules.description: Custom keybindings for Yabai service control
Toggle window full screen with ctrl + t + M using yabai
Cycle through windows with ctrl + t + n/p using yabai
Resize windows with ctrl + t + arrow keys using yabai
Balance windows with ctrl + t + 0 using yabai
Focus window in different directions with ctrl + t + [h/j/k/l] using yabai
Move window to another space with shift + ctrl + [number] using yabai, and then focus on that space
Move to another desktop space and focus on it using control + [number] with yabai
Launch and focus System Settings, Finder with home folder, Karabiner-Elements, Activity Monitor, and start QuickTime screen recording with right shift+letters.

to.shell_command: open '/System/Applications/System Settings.app' && osascript -e 'tell application "System Settings" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to set frontmost of process "System Settings" to true'

osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to make new Finder window to home' -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to set frontmost of process "Finder" to true'

open '/Applications/Karabiner-Elements.app' && osascript -e 'tell application "Karabiner-Elements" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to set frontmost of process "Karabiner-Elements" to true'

open '/System/Applications/Utilities/Activity Monitor.app' && osascript -e 'tell application "Activity Monitor" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to set frontmost of process "Activity Monitor" to true'
